name: Magento Short Description Generator
short_description:
Overview
If you have a large catalog and you don't have time to spend on generating short description for every product individually this is the solution.

This extension generates the short description based on your attributes. You can choose what attributes to show in frontend based on attributes who are set to show in product listing (Use In Product Listing). 

However, if you have special products you can change the short description to make them more appealing.

User Guide

Go to: Modify Attributes and select what attribute to show in short description by selecting Used In Product Listing. 
Go to: Backend > Catalog > Modify Products
Select your products and in upper right corner you have the Actions bar, select 'Generate short description' and click Send
Attention! This operation will rewrite short description for selected
summary: Generates the short description based on your attributes
